scripts.clean:
rimraf build && (rm -R build_app || printf "build_app_doesn't_exist
" ) && (rm -R tempdata || printf "tempdata_doesn't_exist
" )
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run bundle && bun run compile
scripts.dylibs: mkdir ./tempdata && curl -L https://github.com/kmamal/node-sdl/releases/download/v0.10.7/sdl.node-v0.10.7-darwin-x64.tar.gz > ./tempdata/sdlnode.tar.gz && tar -xzvf ./tempdata/sdlnode.tar.gz -C ./tempdata && curl -L https://github.com/Automattic/node-canvas/releases/download/v2.11.2/canvas-v2.11.2-node-v108-darwin-unknown-x64.tar.gz > ./tempdata/canvasnode.tar.gz && tar -xzvf ./tempdata/canvasnode.tar.gz -C ./tempdata && cp -r ./tempdata/Release/* ./tempdata
scripts.build_app: bun run build && bun run copy_build && bun run node_files && bun run dylibs && bun run move_dylibs
